scripts.deploy:netlify: npm run build && npx netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
scripts.deploy:all: echo 'Starting multi-platform deployment...' && npm run build && npm run deploy:github && npm run deploy:firebase && npm run deploy:vercel && npm run deploy:netlify && echo 'All deployments complete!'
scripts.deploy:complete: git add . && git commit -m 'feat: auto-deploy updates' && git push origin main && npm run deploy:all
scripts.clear-cache: node -e "console.log('Clearing Vite cache...'); require('fs').rmSync('node_modules/.vite', {recursive: true, force: true}); console.log('Cache cleared!')"
